extendedInfo.description: The local news experience youâve been waiting for is finally here! WVNS is the premiere news leader for the Bluefield â Beckley, West Virgina area. Now you can get the latest news, sports and weather wherever you go with the WVNS Mobile Local News application. Mobile Local News brings the best of 59News straight to your mobile device. It makes viewing and sharing the news easy. With a few steps, you can get the latest news and share it with friends and family by e-mail, text message and even Twitter and Facebook. Whether itâs severe weather, the newest sports scores or breaking news, the WVNS Mobile Local News application keeps you in-the-know while youâre on-the-go. The new WVNSTV.com app includes: - Local news - West Virginia News - National News - Business News - West Virginia Tonight Live News - Decision Makers Stories - Local and National Sports News - WVU & Virginia Tech Sports News - StormTracker59 Weather Radar and Forecasts - Current conditions that change automatically based on your location. - School Closings and Delays and Severe Weather Alerts - Intuitive, patent-pending navigation - Submit your news pictures and videos to WVNS right from the app - Easy news sharing by e-mail, text message and post to Twitter and Facebook - And moreâ¦ Designed and developed in partnership with DoApp, Inc., best in class in mobile phone development, and Inergize Digital, the media industryâs leading provider of content management solutions, Web sites and interactive technology for television stations and other media companies, the Mobile Local News application makes it easy for media companies to distribute news and information to the mobile masses.

reviews.title: Very Informative
reviews.comment: This is a very good app. Excellent for local news and weather. Helped mw out a lot last winter.
reviews.author: William Workman

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: With my busy schedule, I don\'t always get to watch the evening news. So this is where I always go to.
reviews.author: Lisa Avis

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I use it all the time to get updates on the news and weather
reviews.author: Betsy Loudermilk

reviews.title: Nice?
reviews.comment: Great to have a local weather and news app.
reviews.author: daniel marcus

reviews.title: Best in the state!!!
reviews.comment: WVNS is my \"go to\" app and t.v. station for all of my local news and weather!!! Professional, well groomed, announcers that not only tell the news, but feel it also!!! Keep doing what you do!
reviews.author: Tom Burns

reviews.title: My first pick for Local News
reviews.comment: They seem to remember that they\'re a local news station and seem to always start out with what\'s going on here. I watch local news for local news.
reviews.author: Emory Maxwell

reviews.comment: Love 59 news and u hear it first and my wife loves Spencer with the weather
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great loves it. Helps me keep up with the news in the Beckley area.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is very helpful
reviews.comment: I love it plus it is a shortcut so I do not have to go on the internet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Requires too many permissions
reviews.comment: Requires way too many permissions for a simple news app. Removing.
